title: Executive Order 6041-Authorizing the Appointment of Mrs. Adelle B. Freeman
content: Mrs. Adelle B. Freeman may be appointed a junior bacteriologist in the Department of Agriculture without reference to the civil-service rules.

Mrs. Freeman is the widow of George F. Freeman, whose death was the result of an accident in the performance of his official duties while serving in charge of the Department of Agriculture Puerto Rico Experiment Station. Mrs. Freeman is a graduate of the Kansas State Agricultural College with the degree of bachelor of science.
This order is recommended by the Secretary of Agriculture.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 6041-Authorizing the Appointment of Mrs. Adelle B. Freeman Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361591
